required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Continuous Tremor Assessment During Daily Activities
clinical_study.official_title: ETSense: Adaptive Portable Essential Tremor Monitor - Symptomatic Impact Study

brief_summary.textblock: The specific aim of this study is to evaluate if tremor severity and quality of life can be improved more using continuous home monitoring along with traditional assessments versus traditional assessments alone.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Outcomes Assessor), Primary Purpose: Diagnostic

primary_outcome.time_frame: End of Month 1, End of Month 2, End of Month 3
primary_outcome.description: Utilized to measure any improvement or worsening of symptoms relative to a baseline state at enrollment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Enrollment, End of Month 1, End of Month 2, End of Month 3
secondary_outcome.description: Utilized to measure overall tremor severity

secondary_outcome.measure: Washington Heights Inwood Genetic Study of Essential Tremor (WHIGET) Tremor Rating Scale
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Enrollment, End of Month 1, End of Month 2, End of Month 3
secondary_outcome.description: Utilized to measure overall tremor severity

secondary_outcome.measure: Quality of Life in Essential Tremor Questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Enrollment, End of Month 1, End of Month 2, End of Month 3
secondary_outcome.description: Utilized to measure the impact tremor has on overall quality of life

arm_group.description: Kinesia HomeView utilized to monitor tremor at home and reports provided to treating clinician
Kinesia HomeView utilized to monitor tremor at home and reports not provided to treating clinician

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosed with essential tremor
- Currently taking medication to control tremor
Exclusion Criteria:
- Cognitive limitations that prevent comprehension or execution of study protocol
